attributes.action: STOP Needle Disposal Facilities in Public Toilets
attributes.additional_details:
PLEASE SIGN THIS PARTITION TO STOP THIS!

We do not need needle disposal facilities in public toilets, and wish to have this BANNED throughout the UK.

I currently live in the Hastings area. We have these disposal tubes/holes in our public toilets.
It is now a problem to let my daughters go into one of these toilets without me or mother double checking toilet cubical for needles first. Also we have recently found needles and spoons in our nearby park, so I feel that this is not helping the drug problem and is almost condoning use in public toilets.

BAN NEEDLE DISPOSAL FACILITIES IN PUBLIC TOILETS!

Maybe real help can be offered to users of these terrible dugs! Instead of this!

PLEASE SIGN THIS PARTITION TO STOP THIS!
